Author: HappierHungry
Text: I have TMJ dysfunction, so my jaw pops/clicks fairly frequently; sometimes it's benign but other times it's also painful, the sensation is altered (because of nerve compression secondary to swelling in the joint) and/or I can't chew/my jaw locks (not in the clenched position but I won't be able to open more than ~2-3cm).  You may have simply over-extended the joint (is it 1 side or both?); be careful with how you move it over the next few days, avoid purging (if possible), avoid tough/crunchy food, take some anti-inflammatories, that sort of thing.  If in doubt or if it gets any worse, see your GP and/or your dentist to get it checked out.  Hope this helps ðŸ™‚
